TextLibrary.Text: Khalkus
That's it! That's it! That's it! Ye've found it. All I needs to do is place the button like so and she's all ready to... um...
That's it! That's it! That's it! Ye've found it. All I needs to do is place the button like so and she's all ready to... um...

To what?
To what?

Um...

Khalkus?
Khalkus?
Khalkus?
Khalkus?
I've got no idea, lad.
I've got no idea, lad.
I've got no idea, lass.
I've got no idea, lass.
No idea? All the time we spent searching, with you going on and on about it like it was the greatest invention of all time, and you don't even know what it does?!?
No idea? All the time we spent searching, with you going on and on about it like it was the greatest invention of all time, and you don't even know what it does?!?
No idea? All the time we spent searching, with you going on and on about it like it was the greatest invention of all time, and you don't even know what it does?!?
No idea? All the time we spent searching, with you going on and on about it like it was the greatest invention of all time, and you don't even know what it does?!?
Aye, but she's beautiful, ain't she?
Aye, but she's beautiful, ain't she?
Aye, but she's beautiful, ain't she?
Aye, but she's beautiful, ain't she?
Aren't you going to try it out?
Aren't you going to try it out?
Aren't you going to try it out?
Aren't you going to try it out?
Oh, aye. Have ye got an old item ye can lend me? I'll feed it in and we'll see what happens.
Oh, aye. Have ye got an old item ye can lend me? I'll feed it in and we'll see what happens.
Oh, aye. Have ye got an old item ye can lend me? I'll feed it in and we'll see what happens.
Oh, aye. Have ye got an old item ye can lend me? I'll feed it in and we'll see what happens.
I have this old Broken Shield my grandfather left me.
I have this old Broken Shield my grandfather left me.
I have this old Broken Shield my grandfather left me.
I have this old Broken Shield my grandfather left me.
That'll do just fine. Give it here.
That'll do just fine. Give it here.
That'll do just fine. Give it here.
That'll do just fine. Give it here.
Well look at that. Ye don't see that every day, eh?
Well look at that. Ye don't see that every day, eh?
Well look at that. Ye don't see that every day, eh?
Well look at that. Ye don't see that every day, eh?
It fixed the shield!
It fixed the shield!
It fixed the shield!
It fixed the shield!
Better than fixed it, lad, that's one o' the finest shields I've ever seen!
Better than fixed it, lad, that's one o' the finest shields I've ever seen!
Better than fixed it, lass, that's one o' the finest shields I've ever seen!
Better than fixed it, lass, that's one o' the finest shields I've ever seen!
